name: The Stoning of Saint Stephen
description: The Stoning of Saint Stephen; Workshop of Willem Vrelant (Flemish, died 1481, active 1454 - 1481); Bruges, Belgium; early 1460s; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 25.6 x 17.3 cm (10 1/16 x 6 13/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 8, fol. 76v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Stoning of Saint Stephen
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
